alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 3:02AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL FOREST...EASTERN FLORENCE AND NORTHERN MARINETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM CDT... At 302 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Goodman, or 19 miles southwest of Iron Mountain, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Homestead around 320 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Aurora, West Bass Lake Campground, Commonwealth, Niagara, Lasalle Falls, Spread Eagle, Armstrong Creek, and Fence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
